article_title: UGA student group petitions against Iran Nuclear Deal
article_text:

article_metadata.news_keywords: , uga, university of georgia, israel, politics, politcal, iran nuclear deal, students, aipac, spia, international affairs, agreement, nuclear, iran, deal, congress
article_metadata.author: Abby McHan @abpmchan

og.description: Members of the University of Georgia's American Israel Public Affairs Committee have created a petition protesting the Iran Nuclear Deal, calling for the deal to fail in Congress.
